Name: Linked
About the game: 'Linked' is a relaxing, minimalistic 2d-puzzle game Each puzzle can only be solved by drawing a predetermined number of lines with specific lengths. Great game for short breaks. Features: 144 levels. Steam Integration - Achievements and trading cards.
